title: A-01 Facepak
summary: Aviator model A-01 Facepak for Face by JR Designs
description: Aviation inspired design featuring skeleton hands, oversized 9 and 6, inner 5 minute marks, and a power saving "ambient" mode.**********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the app:http://goo.gl/qRCR7RJoin the community too:http://goo.gl/EDGkmBIf you still have trouble, please contact me.
descriptionHTML:
Aviation inspired design featuring skeleton hands, oversized 9 and 6, inner 5 minute marks, and a power saving "ambient" mode.

**********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)
To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the app:
http://goo.gl/qRCR7R

Join the community too:
http://goo.gl/EDGkmB

If you still have trouble, please contact me.
comments: My "go to" watch face for the G WATCH R I always seem to come back to this one. Excellent ambient mode in green.
nice design but... Notice it drains the watch battery fast. like the design.
Supporting the developers. Love the look and added to my collection.
recentChanges: - Updated ambient mode screen to reduce burn-in on OLED devices
- Fixed text alignment of the date
- Updated to use new Theme Template with Launcher Icon (can be hidden)
